programme.title: Remembering FDR
programme.short_synopsis: The 50th anniversary of the death of Franklin Delano Roosevelt.
programme.medium_synopsis: The passing of Franklin D Roosevelt (1882 -1945) and FDR's legacy 50 years after his death, the evolution of the breaking news story, and the only third-term in office.
programme.long_synopsis: The passing of Franklin D Roosevelt (1882 -1945) and FDR's legacy 50 years after his death, the evolution of the breaking news story, and the only third-term in office.
